title: 115_hr3339
content: The Act titled "Promoting Transparency in Trade Act" requires the publication of texts related to negotiating rounds. The Bipartisan Congressional Trade Priorities and Accountability Act of 2015 is amended to require the publication of proposed and considered texts for each negotiating round on a publicly available website. Additionally, procedural disapproval resolution is updated to include publication of texts. The Bipartisan Congressional Trade Priorities and Accountability Act of 2015 is amended to require the publication of proposed and considered texts for each negotiating round on a publicly available website. Procedural disapproval resolution is updated to include publication of texts, consultations, or notifications during negotiations. The Bipartisan Congressional Trade Priorities and Accountability Act of 2015 is amended to require notification or consultation on negotiations. The Bipartisan Congressional Trade Priorities and Accountability Act of 2015 is amended to require notification or consultation on negotiations, including the President's failure to publish texts with respect to each negotiating round of the parties to the agreement. The Priorities and Accountability Act of 2015 is amended to include a definition of "considered text" in negotiating rounds, regardless of confidentiality, and identifying parties supporting each proposal. The Priorities and Accountability Act of 2015 is amended to include definitions for "negotiating round" and "proposed United States text," detailing the parties involved in supporting or offering proposals during negotiations. The Priorities and Accountability Act of 2015 is amended to include definitions for "negotiating round" and "proposed United States text" for consideration in negotiations. The Trade Act of 1974 is amended to ensure that the Chief Transparency Officer appointed by the Trade Representative does not have any conflicts of interest in overseeing the transparency of the Office of the Trade Representative, including trade negotiations.
